overview: Chet Farris is the President and CEO of Stion. He has 25 years of experience in semiconductors, including more than 10 in photovoltaics. He was previously the President of Shell Solar, where he managed the unitâ€™s day-to-day operations globally. He also served as President of the Solar Energy Industries Association (SEIA), a national trade association, and as a Founding Board Member of the U.S. Department of Energyâ€™s National Center for Photovoltaics.
